page.title: 10A WEEKEND IN WELSHPOOL
page.content: It is 09.45 on saturday July 6th and I am dressed in old clothes ready for cleaning out my rabbits, which live in a shed in the back garden of our public house in Welshpool.{I am 12 {years old}and one of a family of seven (slightly more than average!). Every saturday I get up at about 08.00 and after breakfast go and clean out my rabbits. From about 11.00 I do some reading, homework and watch television until lunchtime at 13.30. The rest of the afternoon I spend relaxing, possibly going for a walk, or to the seaside in the summer. Saturday evenings are mainly spent watching television, listening to records or doing homework. I have tea at 19.00 and go to bed at about 22.00. {Sunday is usually a very quiet day}as I go to Sunday School between 11.00 and 1200 and then just lounge around.
